markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Flame Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=423)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 392 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** An effect would deal fire damage to either you or an ally within range.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** the creature that would take fire damage
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You swiftly deflect incoming flames. The target gains fire resistance 15 against the triggering effect.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance increases by 5.
name: Flame Barrier
